Keywords: Codex , Cosmic , Maximum Carnage , Monster , Mystical
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
MAXIMUM CARNAGE: Once per turn when Doppelganger hits, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to up to 2 opposing characters that weren't hit but are adjacent to a hit character.
SYMBIOTE CODEX HUNTER: Plasticity, Shape Change. /When Doppelganger KO's an opposing character, after resolutions heal 1 click. If that character had the Codex keyword, heal 3 clicks instead.
PERFECT KILLING MACHINE: Charge, Flurry. // Once per turn when Doppelganger uses Flurry, if he hits with both attacks, after resolutions he can immediately use Charge at no cost, but only to target characters he has not attacked this turn.
SPIDER-CLONE: Combat Reflexes, Super Senses, Toughness.

Bat-Phreak
ArkhamInquirer, I agree! Both the new Doppys are very good, but blending the aspects as you suggested would be like the Reese's advertisement: 2 great tastes that taste great together!?! ;-) That version would well be worth a 10-15 point bump on the Prime's cost.
September 10, 2020
ArkhamInquirer
The normal set Doppleganger is amazing, but this guy is even more ferocious. He's a total killing machine, and he's ridiculously difficult to damage, all for 65 points. He's nuts, total Prime material. Honestly, if you took this exact dial, and swapped out the Symbiote Codex Hunter trait for the Shriek trait the base set version has, and then toss in the razor webbing trait too, you'd pretty much have THE definitive Doppelganger.
